articles.title: Google shares how Android 17 is making everything run smoother - Android Authority
articles.description: Google shares the technical details behind its new system to reduce missed frames in Android 17, now in beta testing.
articles.content:
• Google is introducing a new system in Android 17 to reduce time software threads spend waiting for each other to complete.
  • By revising how access to memory is temporarily locked, Deli… [+2963 chars]
